Package DynaBlast

Class Creatures

  • java.lang.Object
    • DynaBlast.Creatures
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character, Enemy
    public class Creatures
extends java.lang.Object
    parent class for all 'alive' objects such as character and enemies stores information about dimensions of creature and his localisation (in double)
